turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I'm so frustrated! I just placed an order and I can't find any information about the shipping status. Where do I even look?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. Please provide your order number, and I can quickly look up the shipping status for you. You can usually find the order number in your order confirmation email or in your account's order history section. Please also note, tracking information may not update for up to 24 hours after your order is shipped.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, the order number is 12345. But, actually, now that I'm looking at the confirmation email, the address is wrong! I moved and forgot to update my shipping info. How do I fix that? And can I still get the order?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I'm showing that order is currently processing. Unfortunately, since the order is already in process, we are unable to edit the shipping address directly. However, once the order ships, you may be able to contact the shipping carrier with your tracking number to redirect the package. Please understand that your order may be subject to return if it is undeliverable and that we cannot guarantee its delivery. We are very sorry for the inconvenience.
